scripts.ExampleHookTestsAll: cd lib && cd periphery-next && forge test -vv
scripts.FullRangeTest: cd lib && cd periphery-next && forge test -vv --match-path ./test/FullRange.t.sol
scripts.LimitOrderTest: cd lib && cd periphery-next && forge test -vv --match-path ./test/LimitOrder.t.sol
scripts.TWAMMTest: cd lib && cd periphery-next && forge test -vv --match-path ./test/TWAMM.t.sol
scripts.GeomeanOracleTest: cd lib && cd periphery-next && forge test -vv --match-path ./test/GeomeanOracle.t.sol
scripts.OracleTest: cd lib && cd periphery-next && forge test -vv --match-path ./test/Oracle.t.sol
